constraints.name: simple_cycle_weight_bound
constraints.description: 所有简单回路的权重和不大于一个定值 B
constraints.formal: ∀ 简单回路 C, Σ(w_i) ≤ B

constraints.name: excitation_non_persistence
constraints.description: 神经节点的兴奋状态不会保留到下一个时刻，除非有新的信号传递
constraints.formal: f(u, t+1) = 0 if no new signal to u at t+1

constraints.name: periodic_excitation
constraints.description: 经过充分长的时间后，n 号神经节点以一个固定时间周期重复进入兴奋状态
constraints.formal: ∃ p, M, ∀ x ≥ M, f(n, x) = f(n, x + p)

constraints.name: self_loop_and_parallel_edges
constraints.description: 图中允许存在自环和重边
constraints.formal: 允许 (u, u) 和多条 (u, v) 边
